name: places/ChIJd5CDwYhYwokR4Ia0jkwM5HY
formattedAddress: 173 W 78th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 173 W 78th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Maria was absolutely amazing. I really don’t think we would have gotten through these first 3 months without her. We just had our first and don’t have any family here so Maria met us when we arrived home from the hospital. She showed us how to do everything with our son and prior to his birth made sure we had everything we needed for his arrival home. I think what I liked most about Maria was how comfortable she made me feel, in particular with breastfeeding. I really struggled with this at the beginning but she helped me through it. Her knowledge of new borns is incredible! 12/10.

originalText.text:
We worked with Karla from NYC birth village during the summer of 2022. I was due with my first child in August, and was looking to hire a postpartum doula/lactation consultant. I couldn't have asked for a better set up!

We did a virtual lactation class in late June with my husband and step mother to help prep me (and all of us) for the things we'd need to know when it came to breastfeeding a newborn. We then scheduled three sessions with Karla, once per week, starting the day after we returned from the hospital.

Karla was absolutely wonderful-- patient, thoughtful, understanding-- and always offered the best advice. She helped us create a plan for how we wanted to feed our baby, and specifically helped identify key roles for my husband to play. In addition to helping my adjust to breastfeeding while I recovered from my c section, she also taught us how to use different swaddles, tips for calming the baby, and shared postpartum recipes to nourish me while I healed.

I can't recommend this experience enough. I feel so grateful to have had such wonderful support, and as I reach my 12 month milestone of breastfeeding, I owe all of the ease and knowledge I now have to Karla!

originalText.text: We decided to hire a doula just a few weeks before my due date due to unforeseen circumstances. We hired Juliet who was incredible to work with. She came with me to my last OB appointment, helped to prepare my apartment for baby, and was super prepared at the hospital. At the hospital I was able to focus on delivery because Juliet was there to advocate for me and handle all logistical matters. She even worked well to include family members on FaceTime. Our post hospital visits were great as well. I highly recommend Juliet as a doula, and would hire her again for a next child.

originalText.text:
NYC Birth Village provided a wonderful and necessary service to me and my family.  Our doula, Sela W., was a wonderful advocate and calm presence throughout our experience. Sela is knowledgeable, patient and a clear communicator. She
set clear goals, provided detailed summaries after each visit and was an invaluable care provider during postpartum complication. Her calming presence and expertise helped keep my partner and I calm during a very stressful time. Her confident knowledge application helped to enforce key aspects of our birth plan and maintain a healthy balance between my desires as a patient and the physicians' recommendations. Highly recommend NYC Birth Village and Doula SELA!  Will absolutely hire SELA again if we desire to have another child. She is a very special, insightful and caring doula.

originalText.text: Our experience with Connie from NYC Birth Village has been truly remarkable.  She has given us invaluable support, care, and relief when we most needed it.  We booked her for overnight services and with our newborn baby, she was able to soothe and tend to her with ease - just like any baby nurse would.  She also took care of our whole family unit by helping with household chores, playing with our older toddler, cooking delicious home meals, organizing closets and so much more.  When she was here, I was able to get the ultimate rest! She taught me how to nurse while laying down, gave me massages, and was there to ensure the baby was nursing well and getting the most intake.  It was the ultimate game changer and a whirl of a difference compared to our baby nurse experience with our first born.  Connie is extremely compassionate and committed.  We are so grateful and lucky to have had her as our doula!  She was the best decision we have made for our new family of four and would recommend her 1000%!
